title: God of War Ragnarök DLC May Be Announced Soon - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.01.23
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:06 - Housekeeping
 - Even if you’ve already experienced the SILENT HILL Ascension season premiere, you should double back to youtube.com/kindafunnygames and check out our live premiere pre-show! We interviewed the team behind the interactive streaming series and got a lot of awesome insight!
 - Mike and Greg had an absolute BLAST with the developers of The Outlast Trials! Catch the archive of the sponsored stream AND interview on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!
A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now where we ask ‘is Alan Wake a GOTY contender’ and Greg gives his review of Thirsty Suitors. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
 - PS I Love You XOXO x BEYOND is recording live tomorrow on Patreon and we’re doing a bracket to decide the best PS5 game. The bracket is up right now on Twitter, fill it out, share it with us and tune in live tomorrow and free on Friday to witness what we crown as PS5’s best game.
     -  The Roper Report   -
00:09:59 - God Of War Ragnarök DLC To Be Announced This Year, Report Claims
00:19:52 - Bungie CEO Claims Layoffs Were Due to Destiny 2 Underperformance
00:32:22 - Lies of P director confirms sequel plans and offers first look at upcoming DLC
00:40:17 - Warioware Move It Review Round Up
00:45:25 - Star Ocean: The Second Story R Review Round Up
00:51:20 - A new Sonic 3D platformer is coming exclusively to Apple Arcade
00:55:56 - The final wave of Mario Kart 8 Deluxe Booster Course tracks has been revealed
00:59:39 - 'Dead by Daylight' × 'Naughty Bear' announced
01:01:01 - Out Today
01:02:15 - “With Like A Dragon Gaiden and Persona 5 Tactica coming out in the next couple of weeks, does Kinda Funny have plans to review these?” - Amiantos
01:03:04 - Squad Up: David - Discord/Steam - SideQuestNPC
01:04:00 - You‘re Wrong
01:05:41 - The Post Show!
